Score method for Random Machines

Source: R/random_machines.R
score.random_machines.Rd

Computes the concordance index for the aggregated predictions.

# S3 method for class 'random_machines'
score(object, data, ...)

Arguments

object

An object of class "random_machines".

data

Validation data (must contain time/event cols).

...

Not used.
